title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
### Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Carrier Strap

Elevate your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercise routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Designed for comfort and durability, this mat features a generous size and cushioning to support you through every pose and movement.

#### Product Features:

- **Extra-Thick Comfort:** At 2/5 inch thickness, this NBR foam mat provides the perfect balance of comfort and stability. Whether you're holding a challenging pose or enjoying a restorative session, the extra-thick cushioning supports your body gently.
- **Dimensions for Freedom of Movement:** With a length of 72 inches and a width of 24 inches, this spacious mat accommodates users of all sizes, granting ample space to stretch out and move freely.
- **Lightweight and Portable:** Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this mat is designed for easy transport. Whether you're heading to a studio or enjoying a session outdoors, the included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap makes it a breeze to carry.
- **Durable NBR Foam:** Crafted from high-quality NBR foam, this mat is built to withstand regular use while providing a soft surface for your workout routine.
- **Versatile Use:** Ideal for a variety of practices, it's suitable for yoga, Pilates, and any floor exercises, ensuring versatility for your fitness needs.
- **Stylish Teal Color:** The beautiful teal color not only looks great but also helps to promote a calming atmosphere, enhancing your focus and relaxation during practice.

#### Product Specifications:

- **Material:** NBR foam
- **Color:** Teal
- **Dimensions:** 72 inches (Length) x 24 inches (Width) x 2/5 inch (Thickness)
- **Weight:** 3.11 pounds

Whether you are a beginner or an experienced practitioner, the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is the perfect companion for your fitness journey. Enjoy a comfortable, stable, and stylish workout surface that's designed with your well-being in mind. Get yours today and transform your daily exercise routine!

- **Generous Dimensions:** Measuring 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, it offers ample space for all types of exercises and movements, whether you're stretching out or striking a pose.
- **Durable Material:** Crafted from high-density NBR foam, the mat is designed to withstand the rigors of daily exercise, providing both durability and a soft touch.
- **Stylish and Functional:** The elegant teal color not only adds a splash of style to your workout gear but also helps to maintain focus with its calming hue.
- **Lightweight and Portable:** Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this mat won't weigh you down. It's easy to carry from home to the studio or park with the included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap.
- **Versatile Use:** Ideal for a variety of practices, from yoga to Pilates to general floor exercises, making it a versatile addition to your fitness arsenal.
- **Hygienic and Easy to Clean:** The material is easy to keep clean and fresh for your next workout, ensuring a hygienic exercise environment.

**What's Included:**

- 1 Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat (Teal)
- 1 Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap

Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned practitioner, the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is the perfect companion for your fitness journey. Its blend of comfort, style, and functionality makes it an essential piece of equipment for anyone looking to enhance their exercise experience.

**Order yours today and transform your workouts with the plush support and convenience of Gaiam Essentials!**
